name: Pocket Killers
description:
Step in the shoes of brutal killers in this pixelated horror game. Hunt down and kill survivors trying to protect their lives through any means necessary.

Inspired by Dead By Daylight and various other Slasher genres.

(This game will be updated after the game jam, keep your eyes peeled)

Control

This game's control is Gameboy-based. WASD to move and SPACE to attack when in-game.  Press X to activate the killer's special power.

Additional Notes

F3 to clear save data(recommended for when updating the game)
